# PayFlux

> PayFlux is a payment risk observability platform providing deterministic risk telemetry and evidence automation for merchants operating on Stripe, Adyen, and Checkout.com.

## Canonical Definition

Payment Risk Observability is the discipline of monitoring processor-behavioral signals in real time to detect escalation risk before processor action occurs.

PayFlux is the reference implementation of this category.

## Core Technical Guarantees

- Deterministic scoring engine
- Bounded memory architecture
- Cryptographically verifiable evidence exports
- Canonicalized system state snapshots
- Contract-validated primitives

## What PayFlux Is Not

- Not a payment processor
- Not a fraud blocker
- Not an analytics dashboard
- Not an ML risk model
